fr.umlv.ig.cheatir
Class DiceThrower

java.lang.Object
  fr.umlv.ig.cheatir.DiceThrower

public class DiceThrower
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple die thrower implementation. This implementation allow you to throw several dice X times. X can be specify for each throw.

Author:
Clement Lebreton & Jordane Marcel

Constructor Summary
DiceThrower(java.util.List<Dice> dices)
          Constructs a die thrower containing all die in the specified list.

          Returns an unmodifiable list of contained dice

Constructor Detail

DiceThrower

public DiceThrower(java.util.List<Dice> dices)
Constructs a die thrower containing all die in the specified list.

Parameters:
dices - the list whose elements are to be placed into this dice thrower
Method Detail

throwDices

public TotalThrowModel throwDices(int throwCount,
                                  TotalThrowModel model)
Throws all the dice X times, and fill model with the result. More formally, throws X times, where X is given in throwCount parameter, before fill the model, this method clear it

Parameters:
throwCount - number of time each die will be throw
model - model to clear and fill with new throw result
Returns:
the model

getDices

public java.util.List<Dice> getDices()
Returns an unmodifiable list of contained dice

Returns:
an unmodifiable list of contained dice
